name: Don't Change Horses in Midstream
description:
Don't change horses in midstream? Pfft, we are above that.

What's that? Don't play with fire? Don't play with food? Too bad we have fire and bread horses here.

You are free to do whatever you want here, screw the rules! You can make a deal with the devil, or get eaten my a mimic if you want. Or you can bully the "don't pee on my leg and tell me it's raining" horse, your choice.

Controls:

WASD, Arrows, D-Pad, Left stick - Movement

Space bar, XBox A - Jump/Enter
